command.description: Moves turtle forward in its current heading by pixels distance.
command.help: Parameters: pixels - Moves the turtle forward by the specified number of pixels.

command.description: Moves turtle backward in its current heading by pixels distance.
command.help: Parameters: pixels - Moves the turtle backward by the specified number of pixels.

command.description: Turns turtle counterclockwise by degrees angle.
command.help: Parameters: degrees - Turns the turtle left (counterclockwise) by the specified number of degrees.

command.description: Turns turtle clockwise by degrees angle.
command.help: Parameters: degrees - Turns the turtle right (clockwise) by the specified number of degrees.

command.description: Turns turtle to an absolute heading.
command.help: Parameters: degrees - Sets the turtle's heading to the specified absolute direction.

command.description: Turns turtle to face the point (x, y), where (0, 0) is the center of the screen.
command.help: Parameters: x y - Turns the turtle to face towards the specified point on the screen.

command.description: Moves turtle to an absolute screen position, where (0, 0) is the center of the screen.
command.help: Parameters: x y - Moves the turtle to the specified screen position.

command.description: Puts pen down such that when the turtle moves, it leaves a trail.
command.help: Parameters: none - Puts the turtle's pen down to draw when moving.

command.description: Puts pen up such that when the turtle moves, it does not leave a trail.
command.help: Parameters: none - Lifts the turtle's pen up to move without drawing.
Parameters: none - Makes the turtle visible on the screen.
Parameters: none - Makes the turtle invisible on the screen.

command.description: Moves turtle to the center of the screen (0, 0).
command.help: Parameters: none - Moves the turtle to the home position at the center of the screen.

command.description: Erases turtle's trails and sends it to the home position.
command.help: Parameters: none - Clears the screen and moves the turtle to the home position.
